type: TS LF Trading Bot Warning - Order Status Not Sync With Exchange

definition.text: For some reason, we could not verify the status of this order at the exchange. This means that the accounting or other actions that needed to be taken will be suspended until the communication with the exchange is restablished.

paragraphs.text: This is normal behaviour you should not worry about. This warning is created in order to let you know that this happened and help you track the details of each trade.
Order Status Not Sync With Exchange
The following are the values of variables at the time this warning was created. They might be useful for you to understand what exactly happened.
